1 ContributorDon’t Let Me Be Lonely Tonight LyricsDo me wrong, do me right, do me right baby. Tell me lies, but hold me tight. Save your goodbyes for the morning light, but don?t let me be lonely tonight

Say goodbye, woman say hello, hello, hello
